襀字的基本解释

襀
jì
〔襞（
b?）襀〕衣裙上的褶子。

襀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》資昔切，入昔，精。］
衣服上的褶裥。

襀字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襀； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1123第19
【集韻】資昔切，音積。【玉篇】襞襀。【類篇】衣閒踧也。【司馬相如·子虛賦】襞襀褰縐。【註】襞襀，?齰也。【篇海】卽今之裙褶也。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襀; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1123 Page 19
[Ji Yun] Zi Xiqie, phonetic product. [Jade articles] Folding. 【Classes】Clothing is also leisurely. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】Folded folds. [Note] Folding, 齰 also. 【Panhai】The skirt pleats of Yu Jin.
